name: CasaMagna Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from our stay here and there are definitely some postives and negatives I thought I would share.
reviews.title: The Good and the Bad

likes.disliked: — Lots and lots of children, service too spotty for what you pay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Positives:
reviews.title: Loved CasaMagna

reviews.text: Location - great location, not right downtown but close enough that the $8 cab ride made a trip to town possible. Very expensive cab ride from the airport though ($18!) There are different fares depending on which zone you travel to but coming from the airport is the worst. And the hotel is only a mile away. The property is located right on the beach but I will have more on the beach to follow...
reviews.title: Friendliest staff

likes.disliked: — The expensive/weak drinks and mediocre food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food - the restaurants here are quite good. Good sized portions and the food tasted great. Las Casitas was a great place to have a sunset dinner and cocktails. The sushi restaurant was good as well. We watched a few basketball playoff games in Champions (their bar) but felt like we were in a sportsbar back home.
reviews.title: PERFECT IN EVERY WAY

reviews.text: Negatives:
reviews.title: Great place to stay, spa was not good...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 12 nights at the CasaMagna and thoroughly enjoyed our stay, the hotel staff were freindly and helpful. The room was classed as garden view but you could sea the Ocean. The rooms although faded are spacious and very clean, with a huge comfortable bed and daily maid service.
reviews.title: Excellent location, excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The air conditioning was noisy, but we were lucky enough not to really need it on.
reviews.title: BEST Resort in PV!

likes.liked: — EVERYTHING! The whole facility was amazing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent most days on the beach, and a polite no thankyou was enough to send the vendors on thier way.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, excellent location

reviews.text: The hotel was very busy when we stayed, but we never had a problem with the service,or the cleanliness of the grounds and public areas. We tended to have lunch La Casitas, which served large portions at reasonable value. Most nights (and sometimes for breakfast) we dined at the marina, where there is an amazing choice of restuarants and we never had a bad meal. The lighthouse pub is fantastic for watching the sun set.
reviews.title: Another Wonderful Time at the Marriott!

likes.liked: — Outstanding Service and Dream Sleep Beds.

reviews.text: Downtown PV is well worth a visit for the buzzing vibrant atmosphere,.
reviews.title: awesome service and what a beauty!

reviews.text: We stayed here last week. The property is beautiful. The staff is friendly. It is located in the marina area which has some shops and restaurants nearby.
reviews.title: Nice property, but a few issues...

reviews.text: We had a few issues:
reviews.title: Marriott CasaMagna: the Ups and Downs

likes.liked: — great staff, great food, nice rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1) HUGE roach (3 inches long) in the bathroom one day
reviews.title: Fantastic property, but expensive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2) Terrible smell coming in the air vent one night. We complained, and they said something like they were cleaing out the stacks. The smell was terrible for about 30 minutes.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Destination

likes.liked: — Upscale Marriott with spacious rooms, great pool and beach, pretty grounds and great fitness room
likes.disliked: — Not the Hotel's fault, but the brown, murky water was a turn-off

reviews.text: 3) You have to tell them to use good alcohol at the pool or they use cheap stuff and the drinks are bad. If you tell them to use the good stuff the drinks are fine.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel but issues with cleanliness at pool and with linen and towels

likes.disliked: — Lounge chairs at pool, towels and bed linen

reviews.text: Wow! is the best way to sum up our experience at the Marriott! There was a group of 6 of us who stayed from Feb.17 to the 24th. We had booked garden view rooms because we didn't want to spend the extra for ocean view. When we got to our rooms (which were adjoining and that was great!) we walked out onto our balcony and we could see the ocean! We could see the ocean while laying in bed!
reviews.title: Amazing!!

reviews.text: The pool area was very nice, great pool, the infinity edge was gorgeous, it looked like the pool went out into the ocean! The one bad thing was that we had to get up around 7 each morning to put towels on the chairs that we wanted. Service around the pool depended on where you were sitting, on one side of the pool we didn't have so great of service, on the other side it was much better. The water aerobics in the pool was very fun! The instructor was very funny. The food from the poolside restaurant was excellent and plentiful. We usually shared one order between two people.
reviews.title: Nice Resort

reviews.text: The beach in front of the hotel was very nice. A little rocky, but mostly very soft sand. You can also walk very far down the beach from the hotel. I have stayed at a hotel closer to downtown and you cannot walk down the beach, here you could walk for a long time. There were only a few beach vendors, and a simple no gracias would send them on their way, they were not very pushy.
reviews.title: An Excellent Choice

reviews.text: The maid always did a great job on our room, we tipped about 3 or 4 dollars a day. The turn down service was nice, we got fresh towels in the evening too. The grounds at the hotel were beautiful!!! Very well maintained and absolutely gorgeous!
reviews.title: Wonderful food, service and air conditioning

likes.liked: — Food, service, AC, convenience of location
likes.disliked: — Not a stylish hotel, it is more traditional style than contemporary architecture

reviews.title: Buyer Beware
reviews.text: The staff were always very friendly, it was nice to return at the end of the day and have the bellmen say "Welcome home", it was a nice touch. We used the concierge a couple of times for recommendations and to make us dinner reservations and he was great!

aka: Casamagna Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort And Spa
